# <a name="chapter-4---description-of-azure-rtos-netx-duo-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-103">Глава 4. Описание служб NetX Duo для ОСРВ Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-103">Chapter 4 - Description of Azure RTOS NetX Duo Services</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-104">В этой главе содержится описание всех служб NetX Duo для ОСРВ Azure в алфавитном порядке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-104">This chapter contains a description of all Azure RTOS NetX Duo services in alphabetic order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-105">Имена служб составлены таким образом, что все аналогичные службы объединены по группам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-105">Service names are designed so all similar services are grouped together.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-106">Например, все службы ARP находятся в начале этой главы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-106">For example, all ARP services are found at the beginning of this chapter.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-107">Для поддержки протоколов и операций на основе IPv6 в NetX Duo появились многочисленные новые службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-107">There are numerous new services in NetX Duo introduced to support IPv6-based protocols and operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-108">Имена служб с поддержкой IPv6 в NetX Duo начинаются с префикса \***nxd**, указывающего, что они предназначены для работы с двумя стеками IPv4 и IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-108">IPv6-enabled services in Net Duo have the prefix \***nxd**,\* indicating that they are designed for IPv4 and IPv6 dual stack operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-109">Существующие службы в NetX полностью поддерживаются в NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-109">Existing services in NetX are fully supported in NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-110">Приложения NetX можно перенести в NetX Duo с минимальными усилиями.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-110">NetX applications can be migrated to NetX Duo with minimal porting effort.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-111">*Обратите внимание, что сокет API, совместимый с BSD, доступен для устаревшего кода приложения, который не может использовать все преимущества высокопроизводительного API NetX Duo. Дополнительные сведения о сокете API, совместимом с BSD, см. в приложении D*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-111">*Note that a BSD-Compatible Socket API is available for legacy application code that cannot take full advantage of the high-performance NetX Duo API. Refer to Appendix D for more information on the BSD-Compatible Socket API*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-112">В разделе "Возвращаемые значения" каждого описания значения, выделенные **полужирным шрифтом**, не затрагиваются параметром NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING, используемым для отключения проверки ошибок API. Значения, не выделенные полужирным шрифтом, полностью отключены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-112">In the "Return Values" section of each description, values in **BOLD** are not affected by the NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING option used to disable the API error checking, while values in non-bold are completely disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-113">В разделах "Допустимые источники" указывается, откуда можно вызывать каждую службу NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-113">The "Allowed From" sections indicate from which each NetX Duo service can be called.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-115">Делает недействительными все динамические записи в кэше ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-116">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-117">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-118">Эта служба делает недействительными все динамические записи ARP, находящиеся в кэше ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-119">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-120">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-121">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — недействительность кэша ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — ARP не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — вызывающий объект не является потоком.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-126">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-127">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-128">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-129">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-130">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-148">Задание динамической записи ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-149">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-150">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-151">Эта служба выделяет динамическую запись из кэша ARP и задает сопоставление указанного IP-адреса с физическим адресом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-152">Если указан нулевой физический адрес, в сеть отправляется фактический запрос ARP, чтобы разрешить физический адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-153">Кроме того, обратите внимание, что эта запись будет удалена, если устаревание по протоколу ARP активно или если кэш ARP исчерпан, а это наиболее давно использовавшаяся запись ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-154">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-155">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-156">**ip_address** — IP-адрес для сопоставления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-157">**physical_msw** — старшие 16 бит (47–32) физического адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-158">**physical_msw** — младшие 32 бита (31–0) физического адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-159">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешный динамический набор записей ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) — в кэше ARP больше нет доступных записей ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-166">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-167">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-168">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-169">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-170">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-188">Включение протокола ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-189">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-190">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-191">Эта служба инициализирует компонент ARP определенного экземпляра IP в NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-192">Инициализация ARP включает в себя настройку кэша ARP и различных подпрограмм обработки ARP, необходимых для отправки и получения сообщений ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-193">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-194">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-195">**arp_cache_memory** — указатель на область памяти для размещения кэша ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-196">**arp_cache_size** — размер каждой записи в ARP составляет 52 байта, таким образом общее количество записей ARP равно размеру, деленному на 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-197">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное включение ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель на кэш ЦП.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) — размер кэша ЦП ARP, указанный пользователем, слишком мал.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) — этот компонент уже включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-203">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-204">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-205">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-206">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-207">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-225">Удаление записи ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-226">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-227">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-228">Эта служба удаляет запись ARP для заданного IP-адреса из внутренней таблицы ARP, соответствующей IP-адресу.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-229">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-230">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-231">**ip_address** — запись ARP с указанным IP-адресом должна быть удалена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-232">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное включение ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) — не удается найти запись с указанным IP-адресом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель на кэш ЦП.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — указан недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-238">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-239">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-240">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-241">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-242">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-260">Отправка необязательного запроса ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-261">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-262">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-263">Эта служба использует все физические интерфейсы для передачи необязательных запросов ARP, если IP-адрес интерфейса является допустимым.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-264">При последующем получении ответа ARP вызывается обработчик ответов для обработки ответа на необязательный ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-265">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-266">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-267">**response_handler** — указатель на функцию обработки ответа.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-268">Если указано значение NX_NULL, ответы игнорируются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-269">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешная отправка необязательного ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) — нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — ARP не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый текущий IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — вызывающий объект не является потоком.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-276">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-277">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-278">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-279">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-280">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-295">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-295">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-296">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-296">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-298">Поиск физического адреса оборудования с учетом IP-адреса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-299">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-300">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-301">Эта служба пытается найти физический адрес оборудования в кэше ARP, связанном с заданным IP-адресом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-302">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-303">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-304">**ip_address** — IP-адрес для поиска.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-305">**physical_msw** — указатель на переменную для возврата старших 16 бит (47–32) физического адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-306">**physical_lsw** — указатель на переменную для возврата младших 32 бит (31–0) физического адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-307">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешный поиск адреса оборудования ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) — сопоставление не найдено в кэше ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель памяти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-314">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-315">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-316">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-317">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-318">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-336">Получение сведений о действиях ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-337">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-338">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-339">Эта служба получает сведения о действиях ARP для соответствующего экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-340">*Если указатель на назначение имеет значение NX_NULL, то эта информация не возвращается вызывающему объекту*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-341">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-342">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-343">**arp_requests_sent** — указатель на назначение для общего числа запросов ARP, отправленных из этого экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-344">**arp_requests_received** — указатель на назначение для общего числа запросов ARP, полученных из сети.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-345">**arp_responses_sent** — указатель на назначение для общего числа ответов ARP, отправленных из этого экземпляра IP-адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-346">**arp_responses_received** — указатель на назначение для общего числа ответов ARP, полученных из сети.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** — указатель на назначение для текущего числа динамических записей ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-348">**arp_static_entries** — указатель на назначение для текущего числа статических записей ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-349">**arp_aged_entries** — указатель на назначение общего числа записей ARP, которые устарели и стали недопустимыми.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-350">**arp_invalid_messages** — указатель на назначение общего числа полученных недопустимых сообщений ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-351">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное получение сведений ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-356">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-357">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-358">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-359">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-360">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-374">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-374">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-378">Поиск IP-адреса с учетом физического адреса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-379">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-380">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-381">Эта служба пытается найти IP-адрес в кэше ARP, связанном с указанным физическим адресом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-382">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-383">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-384">**ip_address** — указатель на возвращаемый IP-адрес, если он найден и сопоставлен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-385">**physical_msw** — старшие 16 бит (47–32) физического адреса для поиска.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-386">**physical_lsw** — младшие 32 бита (31–0) физического адреса для поиска.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-387">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешный поиск IP-адреса ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) — сопоставление не найдено в кэше ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель памяти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — значения physical_msw и physical_lsw равны 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-394">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-395">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-396">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-397">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-398">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-416">Удаление всех статических записей ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-417">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-418">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-419">Эта служба удаляет все статические записи в кэше ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-420">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-421">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-422">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — статические записи удалены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель ip_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-427">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-428">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-429">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-430">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-431">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-449">Создание статического IP-адреса для сопоставления оборудования в кэше ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-450">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-451">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-452">Эта служба создает сопоставление статического IP-адреса с физическим в кэше ARP для указанного экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-453">На статические записи ARP не распространяются периодические обновления протокола ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-454">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-455">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-456">**ip_address** — IP-адрес для сопоставления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-457">**physical_msw** — старшие 16 бит (47–32) физического адреса для сопоставления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-458">**physical_lsw** — младшие 32 бита (31–0) физического адреса для сопоставления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-459">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное создание статической записи ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) — в кэше ARP больше нет доступных записей ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — значения physical_msw и physical_lsw равны 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-467">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-468">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-469">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-470">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-471">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-482">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-482">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-483">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-483">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-484">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-484">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-485">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-485">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-489">Удаление статического IP-адреса для сопоставления оборудования в кэше ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-490">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-491">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-492">Эта служба находит и удаляет ранее созданное сопоставление статического IP-адреса с физическим адресом в кэше ARP для указанного экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-493">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-494">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-495">**ip_address** — IP-адрес, сопоставленный статически.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-496">**physical_msw** — старшие 16 бит (47–\*\*32) физического адреса, сопоставленного статически.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-497">**physical_lsw** — младшие 32 бита (31–\*\*0) физического адреса, сопоставленного статически.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-498">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное удаление статической записи ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) — статическая запись ARP не найдена в кэше ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — этот компонент не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — значения physical_msw и physical_lsw равны 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-506">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-507">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-508">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-509">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-510">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-526">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-526">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-528">Включение протокола ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-529">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-530">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-531">Эта служба включает компонент ICMP для указанного экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-532">Компонент ICMP отвечает за обработку сообщений об ошибках в Интернете, а также запросов и ответов проверки связи.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-533">\*Эта служба включает только протокол ICMP для службы IPv4. Для включения и ICMPv4, и ICMPv6 в приложениях должна использоваться служба \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-534">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-535">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-536">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное включение протокола ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) — протокол ICMP уже включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-541">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-542">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-543">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-544">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-545">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-546">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-546">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-551">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-551">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
