## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1031">Настройка вспомогательного пула пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1032">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1033">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1034">Эта служба настраивает вспомогательный пул пакетов в экземпляре IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1035">В системе с ограниченным объемом памяти пользователь может увеличить эффективность памяти, создав пул пакетов по умолчанию с размером пакета MTU и вспомогательный пул пакетов с меньшим размером пакета для потока IP-адресов, который будет передавать небольшие пакеты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1036">Рекомендуемый размер пакета для вспомогательного пула составляет 256 байт при условии, что включены протоколы IPv6 и IPsec.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1037">По умолчанию экземпляр IP не принимает вспомогательный пул пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1038">Чтобы включить эту функцию, необходимо задать значение *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* при компиляции библиотеки NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1039">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1040">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1041">**aux_pool** — вспомогательный пул пакетов, который необходимо настроить для экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1042">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — IP-адрес успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) — функция пула двойных пакетов не компилируется в библиотеке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес или указатель пула.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1047">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1048">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1049">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1050">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1051">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1066">Создание экземпляра IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1067">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1068">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1069">Эта служба создает экземпляр IP с указанным пользователем IP-адресом и сетевым драйвером.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1070">Кроме того, приложение должно предоставить созданный ранее пул пакетов для экземпляра IP, который будет использоваться для внутреннего распределения пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1071">Обратите внимание, что указанный сетевой драйвер приложения не вызывается до тех пор, пока не будет выполнен поток этого IP-адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1072">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1073">**ip_ptr** — указатель на блок управления для создания экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1074">**name** — имя этого нового экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1075">**ip_address** — IP-адрес для этого нового экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1076">**network_mask** — маска для отделения сетевой части IP-адреса для подсетей и суперсетей.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1077">**default_pool** — указатель на блок управления ранее созданного пула пакетов NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1078">**ip_network_driver** — предоставленный пользователем драйвер сети, используемый для отправки и получения IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1079">**memory_ptr** — указатель на область памяти для стека вспомогательного потока IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1080">**memory_size** — число байтов в области памяти для стека вспомогательного потока IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1081">**priority** — приоритет вспомогательного потока IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1082">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное создание экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) — библиотека NetX Duo настроена неправильно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес, указатель функции сетевого драйвера, пул пакетов или указатель на память.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) — указанный размер стека слишком мал.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — указан недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) — указан недопустимый приоритет потока IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1090">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1091">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1092">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1092">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1093">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1093">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1094">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1120">Удаление ранее созданного экземпляра IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1121">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1122">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1123">Эта служба удаляет ранее созданный экземпляр IP и освобождает все принадлежащие ему ресурсы системы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1124">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1125">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1126">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — экземпляр IP успешно удален.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) — к этому экземпляру IP все еще привязаны сокеты UDP или TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1129">Перед удалением экземпляра IP необходимо отвязать и удалить все сокеты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1132">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1132">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1133">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1133">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1134">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1134">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1135">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1135">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1136">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1136">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1162">Отправка команды сетевому драйверу</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1163">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1164">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1165">Эта служба предоставляет интерфейс для прямого взаимодействия с драйвером основного сетевого интерфейса приложения, указанным во время вызова ***nx_ip_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1166">Можно использовать команды для конкретного приложения, если их числовые значения больше или равны NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1167">*Чтобы отправить команду дополнительному устройству, используйте службу **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command**.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1168">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1169">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1170">**command** — код числовой команды.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1171">Стандартные команды определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1180">**return_value_ptr** — указатель на возвращаемую переменную в вызывающем объекте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1181">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешная прямая команда сетевого драйвера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) — необработанная или нереализованная команда сетевого драйвера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель на возвращаемое значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — недопустимый индекс интерфейса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1187">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1188">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1189">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1190">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1191">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1217">Отправка команды сетевому драйверу</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1218">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1219">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1220">Эта служба предоставляет прямую команду для драйвера сетевого устройства приложения в экземпляре IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1221">Можно использовать команды для конкретного приложения, если их числовые значения больше или равны *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1222">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1223">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1224">**command** — код числовой команды.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1225">Стандартные команды определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1234">**interface_index** — индекс сетевого интерфейса, которому необходимо отправить команду.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1234">**interface_index** Index of the network interface the command should be sent to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1235">**return_value_ptr** — указатель на возвращаемую переменную в вызывающем объекте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1235">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1236">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1236">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешная прямая команда сетевого драйвера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) — необработанная или нереализованная команда сетевого драйвера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — недопустимый индекс интерфейса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый IP-адрес или указатель на возвращаемое значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1242">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1243">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1244">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1245">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1245">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1246">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1272">Отключение пересылки IP-пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1272">Disable IP packet forwarding</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1273">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1273">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1274">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1274">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1275">Эта служба отключает пересылку IP-пакетов внутри IP-компонента NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1275">This service disables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1276">При создании задачи IP эта служба автоматически отключается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1276">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1277">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1277">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1278">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1278">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1279">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1279">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1280">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное отключение IP-пересылки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1280">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1283">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1284">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1285">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1285">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1286">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1287">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_forwarding_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been disabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1313">Включение пересылки IP-пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1313">Enable IP packet forwarding</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1314">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1314">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_forwarding_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1315">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1316">Эта служба включает пересылку IP-пакетов внутри IP-компонента NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1316">This service enables forwarding IP packets inside the NetX Duo IP component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1317">При создании задачи IP эта служба автоматически отключается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1317">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1318">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1319">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1319">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1320">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1320">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное включение IP-пересылки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1321">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP forwarding enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1322">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1323">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1324">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1325">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1325">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1326">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1326">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1327">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1327">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1328">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1328">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP forwarding on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_forwarding_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP forwarding has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1354">Отключение фрагментации IP-пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1354">Disable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1355">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1355">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1356">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1357">Эта служба отключает возможность фрагментации и повторной сборки IP-пакетов IPv4 и IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1358">Пакеты, ожидающие повторной сборки, освобождаются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1359">При создании задачи IP эта служба автоматически отключается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1360">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1361">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1362">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное отключение фрагментации IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — фрагментация IP не включена в экземпляре IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation is not enabled on the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1367">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1370">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1370">No</span></span>

```c
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, disables IP fragmenting on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1397">Включение фрагментации IP-пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1397">Enable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1398">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1398">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1399">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1400">Эта служба включает возможность фрагментации и повторной сборки IP-пакетов IPv4 и IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1401">При создании задачи IP эта служба автоматически отключается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1402">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1403">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1403">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1404">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1404">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное включение фрагментации IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — функции фрагментации IP не компилированы в NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation features is not compiled into NetX Duo.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1409">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1409">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1410">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1410">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1411">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1411">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1412">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1412">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1413">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1413">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP fragmenting has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1439">Очистка адреса шлюза IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1440">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1441">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1442">Эта служба очищает адрес шлюза IPv4, настроенный в экземпляре.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1443">Для очистки IPv6-адреса по умолчанию, внешнего по отношению к экземпляру IP, в приложениях должна использоваться служба ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1444">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1445">**ip_ptr** — указатель на блок управления IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1446">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешная очистка адреса шлюза IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый блок управления IP-адресом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — служба не вызывается из инициализации системы или контекста потока.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1450">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1451">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1452">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1452">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1453">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1453">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1454">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1454">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Clear the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1455">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1455">See Also</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1456">-nx_ip_gateway_address_get -nx_ip_gateway_address_set -nx_ip_info_get -nx_ip_static_route_add -nx_ip_static_route_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_add -nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1456">-nx_ip_gateway_address_get -nx_ip_gateway_address_set -nx_ip_info_get -nx_ip_static_route_add -nx_ip_static_route_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_add -nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete -nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_get -nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1458">Получение адреса шлюза IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1458">Get the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1459">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1460">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1461">Эта служба получает адрес шлюза IPv4, настроенный в экземпляре IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1462">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1463">**ip_ptr** — указатель на блок управления IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1464">**ip_address** — указатель на память, в которой хранится адрес шлюза</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1465">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное получение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на блок управления IP или новый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) — не найден адрес шлюза</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — служба не вызывается из инициализации системы или контекста потока.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1470">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1470">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1471">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1471">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1472">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1472">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1473">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1473">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1474">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1474">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG ip_address;

/* Get the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1487">Задание IP-адреса шлюза</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1488">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1489">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1490">Эта служба задает IP-адрес шлюза IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1491">Весь трафик, исходящий из сети, направляется в этот шлюз для передачи.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1492">Шлюз должен быть доступен напрямую через один из сетевых интерфейсов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1493">Чтобы настроить адрес шлюза IPv6, используйте службу ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1494">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1495">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1496">**ip_address** — IP-адрес шлюза.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1497">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — IP-адрес шлюза успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1502">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1503">Инициализация, поток</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1504">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1505">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1506">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1512">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1512">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1513">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1513">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1514">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1514">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1515">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1515">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1516">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1516">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1517">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1517">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1519">Получение сведений о действиях IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1520">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1521">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1522">Эта служба получает сведения о действиях протокола IP для указанного экземпляра IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1523">*Если указатель на назначение имеет значение NX_NULL, то эта информация не возвращается вызывающему объекту*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1524">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1525">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа отправленных IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа отправленных байтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа полученных IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа полученных по протоколу IP байтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа недопустимых IP-пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа полученных и необработанных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа ошибок контрольной суммы в полученных пакетах.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа отправленных и необработанных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа отправленных фрагментов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа полученных фрагментов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1536">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное получение сведений IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1540">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1541">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1542">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1542">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1543">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1544">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1570">Получение IP-адреса интерфейса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1571">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1572">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1573">Эта служба получает адрес IPv4 указанного сетевого интерфейса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1574">Для получения IPv6-адреса в приложении должна использоваться служба ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1575">*Если указанное устройство не является первичным, его необходимо предварительно подключить к экземпляру IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1576">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1577">**ip_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1578">**interface_index** — индекс интерфейса совпадает с индексом сетевого интерфейса, подключенного к экземпляру IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1579">**ip_address** — указатель на место назначения для IP-адреса интерфейса устройства.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1580">**network_mask** — указатель на место назначения для маски сети интерфейса устройства.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1581">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное получение IP-адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — указан недопустимый сетевой интерфейс.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1586">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1587">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1588">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1589">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1590">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1598">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1598">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1599">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1599">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1600">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1600">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1601">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1601">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1602">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1602">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1603">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1603">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1605">Указание необходимости сопоставления адресов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1606">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1607">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1608">Эта служба определяет, требуется ли сопоставление IP-адреса с MAC-адресом для указанного сетевого интерфейса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1609">Эта служба обычно вызывается из драйвера устройства интерфейса для уведомления стека IP о том, требуется ли для базового интерфейса сопоставление IP-адреса с MAC-адресом на уровне 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1610">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1611">**ip_ptr** — указатель на блок управления IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1612">**interface_index** — индекс сетевого интерфейса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE — требуется сопоставление адресов, NX_FALSE — не требуется сопоставление адресов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1614">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешная настройка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — недопустимый индекс устройства</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на блок управления IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — служба не вызывается из инициализации системы или контекста потока.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1619">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1620">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1621">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-1622">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-1623">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```
