- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2529">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2529">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2530">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2530">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2531">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2531">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2532">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2532">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2533">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2533">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2536">Выделение пакета из указанного пула</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2537">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2538">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2539">Эта служба выделяет пакет из указанного пула и корректирует положение указателя начала в пакете в соответствии с указанным типом пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2540">Если пакет недоступен, служба приостанавливает работу в соответствии с указанным параметром ожидания.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2541">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2542">**pool_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный пул пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2543">**packet_ptr** — указатель на указатель выделенного указателя на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2544">**packet_type** — определяет тип запрошенного пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2545">Список поддерживаемых типов пакетов см. в разделе "Пулы пакетов" главы 3 на стр. 63.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2546">**wait_option** — определяет время ожидания в тактах, если в пуле пакетов нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2547">Параметры ожидания определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2550">**значение времени ожидания в тактах** (от 0x00000001 до 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2551">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пакет выделен успешно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) — нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) — запрошенная приостановка прервана вызовом tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — размер пакета не поддерживается протоколом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) — недопустимый тип пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на возвращаемый пул или пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый параметр ожидания не из потока.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2559">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2560">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR (сетевые драйверы приложений)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2561">Параметр ожидания должен иметь значение *NX_NO_WAIT* при использовании в ISR или контексте таймера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2562">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2563">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2564">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2579">Копирование пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2580">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2581">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2582">Эта служба копирует сведения из предоставленного пакета в один или несколько новых пакетов, выделенных из указанного пула пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2583">В случае успеха возвращается указатель на новый пакет в месте назначения, на которое указывает **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2584">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2585">**packet_ptr** — указатель на исходный пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2586">**new_packet_ptr** — указатель на место назначения, в котором нужно вернуть указатель на новую копию пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2587">**pool_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный пул пакетов, который используется для выделения одного или нескольких копируемых пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2588">**wait_option** — определяет ожидание службы в случае, если нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2589">Параметры ожидания определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2592">**значение времени ожидания в тактах** (от 0x00000001 до 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2593">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пакет успешно скопирован.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) — пакет недоступен для копирования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) — исходный пакет пуст или не удалось выполнить копирование.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) — запрошенная приостановка прервана вызовом tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — размер пакета не поддерживается протоколом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый пул, пакет или указатель на место назначения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) — недопустимый указатель начала пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) — недопустимый указатель для добавления пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — параметр ожидания был указан при инициализации или в ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2603">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2604">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2605">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2606">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2607">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2613">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2613">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2614">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2614">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2615">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2615">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2616">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2616">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2617">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2617">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2618">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2618">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2620">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2620">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2622">Добавление данных в конец пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2623">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2624">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2625">Эта служба добавляет данные в конец указанного пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2626">Указанная область данных копируется в пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2627">Если недостаточно памяти и включена функция сцепления пакетов, то для выполнения запроса будет выделен один или несколько пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2628">Если функция сцепления пакетов не включена, возвращается *NX_SIZE_ERROR*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2629">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2630">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2631">**data_start** — указатель на начало пользовательской области данных для добавления к пакету.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2632">**data_size** — размер пользовательской области данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2633">**pool_ptr** — указатель на пул пакетов, из которого нужно выделить другой пакет, если в текущем пакете недостаточно места.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2634">**wait_option** — определяет поведение службы в случае, если нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2635">Параметры ожидания определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2638">**значение времени ожидания в тактах** (от 0x00000001 до 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2639">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пакет успешно добавлен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) — нет доступных пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) — запрошенная приостановка прервана вызовом tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) — размер пакета не поддерживается протоколом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) — указатель начала меньше, чем начало полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) — указатель для добавления больше, чем конец полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый пул, пакет или указатель на данные.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) — недопустимый размер данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый параметр ожидания не из потока.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2649">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2650">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR (сетевые драйверы приложений)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2651">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2652">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2653">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2668">Извлечение данных из пакета по смещению</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2669">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2670">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2671">Эта служба копирует данные из пакета NetX Duo (или из цепочки пакетов) начиная с указанного смещения от указателя начала пакета указанного размера в байтах в заданный буфер.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2672">Число фактически скопированных байтов возвращается в *bytes_copied*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2673">Эта служба не удаляет данные из пакета и не настраивает указатель начала или другие сведения о внутреннем состоянии.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2674">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2675">**packet_ptr** — указатель на извлекаемый пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2676">**offset** — смещение от текущего указателя начала.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2677">**buffer_start** — указатель на начало буфера сохранения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2678">**buffer_length** — число копируемых байтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2679">**bytes_copied** — число фактически скопированных байтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2680">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пакет успешно скопирован.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) — указано недопустимое значение смещения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на пакет или буфер.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2684">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2685">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2686">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2687">нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2692">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2692">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2693">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2693">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2694">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2694">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2695">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2695">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2696">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2696">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2697">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2697">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2698">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2699">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2699">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2700">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2700">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2702">Получение данных из пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2703">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2704">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2705">Эта служба копирует данные из предоставленного пакета в указанный буфер.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2706">Фактическое число скопированных байтов возвращается в месте назначения, на которое указывает **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2707">Обратите внимание, что эта служба не изменяет внутреннее состояние пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2708">Получаемые данные по-прежнему доступны в пакете.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2709">*Буфер назначения должен быть достаточно большим, чтобы вместить содержимое пакета. В противном случае память будет повреждена, что приведет к непредсказуемым результатам*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2710">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2711">**packet_ptr** — указатель на исходный пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2712">**buffer_start** — указатель на начало буферной области.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2713">**bytes_copied** — указатель на место назначения для числа скопированных байтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2714">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — данные успешно получены из пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) — недопустимый пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на пакет, начало буфера или копируемые байты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2718">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2719">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2720">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2721">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2722">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2734">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2734">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2737">Получение длины данных в пакете</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2738">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2739">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2740">Эта служба получает длину данных в указанном пакете.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2741">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2742">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2743">**length** — место назначения для длины пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2744">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное получение длины пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2747">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2748">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2749">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2750">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2751">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2766">Создание пула пакетов в указанной области памяти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2767">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2768">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2769">Эта служба создает пул пакетов указанного размера в области памяти, заданной пользователем.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2770">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2771">**pool_ptr** — указатель на блок управления пулом пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2772">**name** — указатель на имя приложения для пула пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2773">**payload_size** — число байтов в каждом пакете в пуле.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2774">Это значение должно быть не менее 40 байт и кратно 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2775">**memory_ptr** — указатель на область памяти, в которой будет размещен пул пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2776">Указатель должен быть выровнен по границе ULONG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2777">**memory_size** —размер области памяти пула.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2778">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пул пакетов успешно создан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на пул или память.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) — недопустимый размер блока или памяти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2783">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2784">Инициализация, потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2785">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2786">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2787">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2792">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2792">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2793">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2793">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2794">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2794">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2795">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2795">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2796">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2796">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2797">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2797">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2798">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2798">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2799">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2799">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2800">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2800">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2802">Удаление ранее созданного пула пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2803">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2804">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2805">Эта служба удаляет ранее созданный пул пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2806">NetX Duo проверяет наличие потоков, приостановленных при обработке пакетов в пуле пакетов, и отменяет приостановку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2807">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2808">**pool_ptr** — указатель на блок управления пулом пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2809">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пул пакетов успешно удален.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на пул.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2813">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2814">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2815">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2816">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2817">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2817">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created packet pool. */
status = nx_packet_pool_delete(&pool_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2824">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2824">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2832">Получение сведений о пуле пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2833">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2834">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2835">Эта служба получает сведения об указанном пуле пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2836">*Если указатель на назначение имеет значение NX_NULL, то эта информация не возвращается вызывающему объекту*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2837">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2838">**pool_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный пул пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2839">**total_packets** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа пакетов в пуле.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2840">**free_packets** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа пакетов, свободных в данный момент.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2841">**empty_pool_requests** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа запросов на выделение, если пул был пуст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа приостановок в пустом пуле.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** — указатель на место назначения для общего числа недопустимых освобождений пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2844">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сведения о пуле пакетов успешно получены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на IP-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2848">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2849">Инициализация, потоки и таймеры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2850">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2851">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2852">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2867">Задание нижнего предела для пула пакетов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2868">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2869">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2870">Эта служба настраивает нижний предел для указанного пула пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2871">Если задано значение нижнего предела, протокол TCP или UDP не будет ставить в очередь полученные пакеты, если количество доступных пакетов в пуле пакетов меньше нижнего предела, что предотвращает нехватку трафика в пуле пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2872">Эта служба доступна, если библиотека NetX Duo создана с указанным параметром ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2873">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2874">**pool_ptr** — указатель на блок управления пулом пакетов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2875">**low_watermark** — значение нижнего предела для настройки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2876">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — значение нижнего предела успешно задано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) — функция нижнего предела не встроена в NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на пул.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2881">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2882">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2883">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2884">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2885">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2892">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2892">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2896">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2896">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2897">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2897">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2898">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2898">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2900">Освобождение ранее выделенного пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2901">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2902">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2903">Эта служба освобождает пакет, а также все сцепленные с ним пакеты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2904">Если другой поток блокируется при выделении пакета, ему предоставляется пакет и его работа возобновляется.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2905">*Приложение должно предотвращать многократное освобождение пакета, так как оно приведет к непредсказуемым результатам*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2906">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2907">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2908">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пакет успешно освобожден.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) — указатель начала меньше, чем начало полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) — указатель для добавления больше, чем конец полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2913">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2914">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры и подпрограммы ISR (сетевые драйверы приложений)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2915">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2916">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2917">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2924">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2924">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2932">Освобождение переданного пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2933">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2934">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2935">Для пакетов, отличных от TCP, эта служба освобождает переданный пакет, а также все сцепленные с ним пакеты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2936">Если другой поток блокируется при выделении пакета, ему предоставляется пакет и его работа возобновляется.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2937">TCP-пакет помечается как передаваемый, но не освобождается, пока не будет подтвержден.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2938">Эта служба обычно вызывается из сетевого драйвера приложения после передачи пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2939">*Сетевой драйвер должен удалить заголовок физического носителя и изменить длину пакета перед вызовом этой службы*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2940">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2941">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2942">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — переданный пакет успешно освобожден.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) — указатель начала меньше, чем начало полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) — указатель для добавления больше, чем конец полезных данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2947">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2948">Инициализация, потоки, таймеры, сетевые драйверы приложений (в том числе подпрограммы ISR)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2949">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-2950">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-2951">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```
