## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6306">Создание TCP-подключения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6307">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6308">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6309">Эта служба устанавливает TCP-подключение с помощью ранее созданного сокета клиента TCP к порту указанного сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6310">Эта служба работает в сетях IPv4 или IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6311">Допустимый диапазон портов TCP-сервера — от 0 до 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6312">NetX Duo определяет соответствующий физический интерфейс на основе IP-адреса сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6313">Эквивалентная служба в NetX (IPv4) — ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6314">Сокет должен быть привязан к локальному порту.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6315">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6316">**socket_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный TCP-сокет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6317">**server_ip** — указатель на IPv4- или IPv6-адрес назначения в порядке байтов узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6318">**server_port** — номер порта сервера для подключения (от 1 до 0xFFFF) в порядке байтов узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6319">**wait_option** — параметр ожидания до установления подключения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6320">Параметры ожидания определяются следующим образом:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6323">**значение времени ожидания в тактах** (от 0x00000001 до 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6324">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сокет успешно подключен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) — запрошенная приостановка прервана вызовом tx_thread_wait_abort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) — недопустимый IPv4- или IPv6-адрес сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) — сокет не привязан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) — сокет не находится в закрытом состоянии.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) — параметр ожидания не указан; выполняется попытка подключения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — недопустимый индекс интерфейса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) — у сетевого интерфейса нет допустимого IPv6-адреса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — протокол TCP не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) — недопустимый порт.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель сокета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) — сбой подключения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6338">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6339">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6340">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6341">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6342">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6367">Получение IP-адреса однорангового TCP-сокета и номера порта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6368">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6369">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6370">Эта служба получает одноранговый IP-адрес и сведения о порте для подключенного TCP-сокета по сети IPv4 или IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6371">Эквивалентная служба в NetX (IPv4) — ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6372">Обратите внимание, что *socket_ptr* должен указывать на TCP-сокет, который уже подключен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6373">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6374">**socket_ptr** — указатель на TCP-сокет, подключенный к одноранговому узлу.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6375">**peer_ip_address** — указатель на одноранговый IPv4- или IPv6-адрес.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6376">Возвращаемый IP-адрес находится в порядке байтов узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6377">**peer_port** — указатель на номер однорангового порта.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6378">Возвращенный номер порта указан в порядке байтов узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6379">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сведения о сокете успешно получены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) — сокет не подключен к одноранговому узлу.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) — протокол TCP не включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимые входные данные указателя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6385">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6386">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6387">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6388">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6389">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6414">Извлечение параметров сети из UDP-пакета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6415">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6416">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6417">Эта служба извлекает сетевые параметры из пакета, полученного в сетях UDP IPv4 или IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6418">Эквивалентная служба в NetX — ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6419">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6420">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6421">**ip_address** — указатель на IP-адрес отправителя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6422">**protocol** — указатель на возвращаемый протокол.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6423">**port** — указатель на номер порта отправителя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6424">**interface_index** — указатель на индекс сетевого интерфейса, из которого получен этот пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6425">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — данные интерфейса пакета успешно извлечены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) — пакет не относится ни к IPv4, ни к IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимые входные данные указателя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6430">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6431">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6432">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6433">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6434">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6458">Отправка датаграммы UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6459">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6460">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6461">Эта служба отправляет датаграмму UDP через ранее созданный и привязанный UDP-сокет для сетей IPv4 или IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6462">NetX Duo находит локальный IP-адрес, подходящий в качестве адреса источника, по IP-адресу назначения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6463">Чтобы указать определенный интерфейс и IP-адрес источника, приложение должно использовать службу ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6464">Обратите внимание, что эта служба возвращает управление немедленно независимо от того, была ли датаграмма UDP успешно отправлена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6465">Эквивалентная служба в NetX (IPv4) — ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6466">Сокет должен быть привязан к локальному порту.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6467">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6467">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6487">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6511">Отправка датаграммы UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6512">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6513">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6514">Эта служба отправляет датаграмму UDP через ранее созданный и привязанный UDP-сокет для сетей IPv4 или IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6515">Параметр *address_index* указывает IP-адрес источника, используемый для исходящего пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6516">Обратите внимание, что эта функция возвращает управление немедленно независимо от того, была ли датаграмма UDP успешно отправлена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6517">Сокет должен быть привязан к локальному порту.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6518">Эквивалентная служба в NetX (IPv4) — ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6519">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6520">**socket_ptr** — указатель на ранее созданный экземпляр UDP-сокета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6521">**packet_ptr** — указатель на пакет датаграммы UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6522">**ip_address** — указатель на порт IPv4- или IPv6-адреса назначения. Допустимый номер порта назначения (от 1 до 0xFFFF) в порядке байтов узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6523">**address_index** — индекс, указывающий адрес источника, используемый для пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6524">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — отправка через UDP-сокет успешно выполнена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) — сокет не привязан ни к одному порту.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) — не найден подходящий исходящий интерфейс.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель на сокет, адрес или пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) — номер порта не входит в допустимый диапазон.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) — указан допустимый сетевой интерфейс.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) — недостаточно места для заголовка UDP в пакете.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) — недопустимый указатель для добавления пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6541">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6563">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6563">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6565">Получение сведений об источнике пакетов UPD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6566">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6567">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6568">Эта служба извлекает IP-адрес и номер порта источника из пакета UDP, полученного через UDP-сокет узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6569">Эквивалентная служба в NetX (IPv4) — ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6570">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6571">**packet_ptr** — указатель на полученный пакет UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6572">**ip_address** — указатель на структуру NXD_ADDRESS для хранения IP-адреса источника пакета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6573">**port** — указатель на номер порта UDP-сокета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6574">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешное извлечение источника.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) — недопустимый пакет.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель сокета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88f38-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6579">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6580">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6580">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6581">Возможно вытеснение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6581">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88f38-6582">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6582">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="88f38-6583">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88f38-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
